verses.verse: To the chief<WH5329> Musician,<WH5329> A Psalm<WH4210> for the sons<WH1121> of Korah.<WH7141> O clap<WH8628> your hands,<WH3709> all<WH3605> you people;<WH5971> shout<WH7321> to God<WH430> with the voice<WH6963> of triumph.<WH7440>
For the LORD<WH3068> most<WH5945> high<WH5945> is terrible;<WH3372> he is a great<WH1419> King<WH4428> over<WH5921> all<WH3605> the earth.<WH776>
He shall subdue<WH1696> the people<WH5971> under<WH8478> us, and the nations<WH3816> under<WH8478> our feet.<WH7272>
He shall choose<WH977> our inheritance<WH5159> for us, the excellency<WH1347> of Jacob<WH3290> whom<WH834> he loved.<WH157> Selah.<WH5542>
God<WH430> is gone<WH5927> up with a shout,<WH8643> the LORD<WH3068> with the sound<WH6963> of a trumpet.<WH7782>
Sing<WH2167> praises to God,<WH430> sing<WH2167> praises: sing<WH2167> praises to our King,<WH4428> sing<WH2167> praises.
For God<WH430> is the King<WH4428> of all<WH3605> the earth:<WH776> sing<WH2167> you praises with understanding.<WH7919>
God<WH430> reigns<WH4427> over<WH5921> the heathen:<WH1471> God<WH430> sits<WH3427> on the throne<WH3678> of his holiness.<WH6944>

The princes<WH5081> of the people<WH5971> are gathered<WH622> together,<WH3162> even the people<WH5971> of the God<WH430> of Abraham:<WH85> for the shields<WH4043> of the earth<WH776> belong to God:<WH430> he is greatly<WH3966> exalted.<WH5927>
